QuestData.Title: The Consortium Needs You!
QuestData.Description: My organization, the Consortium, is looking for a few resourceful individuals just like yourself. You'll be hard pressed to find ethereals more honest, hard-working or pleasant to be around than us.$B$BAll we require is loyalty, dedication and a reasonable amount of moral flexibility. If you're interested, speak to Gezhe, our ground operations leader. You will find him at Aeris Landing, north of Oshu'gun.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Gezhe at Aeris Landing in Nagrand.
QuestData.RewardText: Are you ready to get to work, $r? I think I've got the perfect task for you.
